page.title: 19No Sports Hall for Us
page.content: People in New Mills are concerned that we have not got a Sports Hall. Recently there has been a petition for the Sports Hall to be built.If we still had a carnival maybe we would be able to raise enough money to build such a structure for public use.Next to the swimming pool and squash courts they have built a clinic and left a space for the Sports Hall. The council do not want the Sports Hall because the council is from all over the High Peak and they are more concerned with Buxton and other places.New Mills has got a Youth Centre.The Youth Club has got Table Tennis, Pool, Football, Netball, Weightlifting,etc.The Youth Centre is keeping teenages out of trouble and off the streets.The Sports Hall would help more of them to keep out of trouble.
